thread.title: Scott Disick on Kourtney Kardashian split: 'worst decision of my life'
thread.title_full: Scott Disick on Kourtney Kardashian split: 'worst decision of my life' - UPI.com

author: upi.com
title: Scott Disick on Kourtney Kardashian split: 'worst decision of my life'
text:
LOS ANGELES, Oct. 12 (UPI) -- Scott Disick sheds tears and pronounces regrets in the first promo for the upcoming eleventh season of Keeping Up With The Kardashians. 
In the promo, Kourtney Kardashian 's ex-boyfriend Scott Disick is confronted by the family over his raucous behavior. Disick fights tears as he admits to making "the worst decision" of his life, after he was caught partying with other women.
"It breaks my heart to see her in pain," Kardashian's mom Kris Jenner tells Disick, who is the father of Kourtney's two children---Mason, 5, and Penelope, 3.
Disick also talks about his alcohol consumption problem and how he behaves when he is under the influence. The 32-year-old reality star had a stint in rehab earlier this year and was also belligerent as he accompanied Jenner to her 59th birthday party at 1 OAK in Las Vegas earlier this year.
Disick has also made headlines after photos surfaced of him canoodling with former girlfriend, Chloe Bartioli, in Monte Carlo in July. Upon learning of Disick's infidelity, Kardashian said she couldn't handle him anymore and that the revelation urged her to "move on."
Recently, Disick has been spotted having drinks and partying with 18-year-old model Lindsay Vrckovnik in New York.
Keeping Up With the Kardashians airs on E! Sunday evenings and will return for another season Nov. 15.
